positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.description: Collaborate with engineering and product on the platform to create compelling features and experiences
responsibilities: Develop modern web applications and services in agile sprints
Write clean, efficient, reliable code using proven, reliable components and design patterns. Implement A/B tests, write unit tests and fix bugs
Follow established best practices and processes to ensure code quality with an eye for performance and maintainability
Assist team with the design & architecture of the platform stack
Independently implement assigned modules as per design specification adhering to coding

positions.title: UI Developer
positions.description: Manage development tasks independently, takes self-initiatives to tackle challenges in the project and team, avid thinker to get creative solutions
responsibilities: Design and develop high quality software services and features, working with architects and other team members
Participate in, contribute to and continuously improve Agile software development processes
Work under the guidance of development managers or others to analyse, modify and implement various common business needs research, assess and adopt new technologies as required
Assist project managers with the development of detailed estimates and work plans and ensure that projects are delivered on time and that they meet clients' and users' business needs
Interacting with team members, and customers to continuously look for better innovations
Implements Web UI design and assists in the testing and user acceptance of Web pages and applications
Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers
Experience of working on responsive design layout, fluid layout and media queries

positions.title: Senior UI Engineer
positions.description: Implementation of Angular framework and custom reusable components with optimum performance.
responsibilities: Building reusable components
JWT token authentication implementation
Export data to file functionality
Integration of rest API
Accessibility
Performance optimization
Guide best practices around accessible, semantic UI/UX

positions.title: UI Developer
positions.company: Connect | 91 Web Solution Pvt. Ltd. (Polyscripts Infotech Pvt. Ltd.)
positions.description: UI enhancement designs for better user experience, convert PSD into HTML and make the websites compatible with all browsers.
responsibilities: Create UI/UX designs
Convert PSD into HTML templates
Building SASS framework for E-commerce application
Responsive design across all devices and browsers

positions.title: Web Developer
positions.description: Responsible for participating in the full life cycle of new website development and maintaining best practice procedures in all areas of work.
responsibilities: Wordpress website design, maintenance and development
Building cron-job system for email notification
Design custom e-mail templates
E-commerce and retail application development using MVC framework
Create interactive web UI/UX with responsive web design for web application
